editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-12v: Introduction to the Prayer of the Covenant, Ṣälotä Kidan, ጸሎተ፡ ኪዳን፡, with musical notation. F-14r: Liton for evening prayer. F-23v: Supplications for the Night, መስተብቍዕ ዘሌሊት. F-32v: Liton for the days of the week: Monday (), Tuesday (), Wednesday (), Thursday (), Friday (), Saturday (), Holy Saturday (), Sunday, (31v). F-34r: Supplication for the Departed, Bä’ntä ‘ǝlä Nomu. በእንተ፡ እለ፡ ኖሙ፡. F-36v: Supplication for the Departed, Ǝgzi’ǝ Ḥǝyawan, እግዚአ፡ ህያዋን፡. F-38r: Prayer for the Night from the Horologium of the Night Hours. F-40r: Supplication for the Cross, Lä‘ǝṣ Qǝdus Mäsqäl, ወካዕበ፡ ናስተበቍዖ፡ ለዕፀ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መስቀል፡. F-41r: Supplication for Saint Mary, Längǝstä Kwulǝnä, ለንግሥተ፡ ኵልነ፡. F-50v: Prayer of Enthronement of Abunä Yared, ዘይነግሥ፡ ዘአቡነ፡ ያሬድ፡. F: Opening Processional. F-66v: Office Prayers. F-71r: Anaphora of Our Lady Mary attributed to Cyriacus of Bəhənsa, Qǝddase Maryam Gwäs’a, ቅዳሴ፡ ማርያም፡. F-73v: Anaphora of John, Son of Thunder, Qǝddase Yoḥannəs Wäldä Nägwädǝgwad, ቅዳሴ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡. F-76v: Anaphora of the 318 Orthodox Fathers, Qǝddase za-Śäläsǝtu, ቅዳሴ፡ ዘሠለስቱ፡ ምዕት፡. F-77v: Anaphora of Basil of Caesarea, Qǝddase Baslǝyos, ቅዳሴ፡ ባስልዮስ፡. F-78v: Anaphora of Gregory. F-79v: Anaphora of Jacob of Serugh, Qǝddase Ya’ǝkob Zä-Śǝrug, ቅዳሴ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘሥሩግ፡. F-80v: Anaphora of John Chrysostom, Qǝddase Yoḥannəs Afä Wärq, ቅዳሴ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈወርቅ፡. F-81v: Anaphora of Dioscorus, Qǝddase Diosǝqoros, ቅዳሴ፡ ዲዮስቆሮስ፡. F-82v: Anaphora of Epiphanius, Qǝddase Epifanǝyos, ቅዳሴ፡ ኤጲፋንዮስ. F-83r: Anaphora of Cyril of Alexandria, Qǝddase Qerǝlos, ቅዳሴ፡ ቄርሎስ፡. F. Anaphora of (second) Gregory. F-86v: Priestly blessings. F: Order for learning the liturgy. F-88r: Orders of the chants.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
